usercssData.author: Joseph Dickson
usercssData.description: Removes the shadow gradient behind the YouTube video player bar and gradient above. Helps a little bit with reading and seeing stuff normally hidden by this bar. :P I miss the old player that didn't cover videos :'/  I've made the option to set the opacity between 0% and 100% to vary how visible the gradients are. hope you enjoy~ ^_^  I'll try find out if I can give the option to color them, I'm still learning. let me know in the comments if you want this feature, cheers. :D    -If you want the Player bar to be moved below the video, try my other style for it: style 137651

/* ==UserStyle==
@name           Amazon Stony Dark
@description    Change colors, hide (self-)advertisement, control review bar width
@namespace      Stonecrusher
@author         Stonecrusher
@version        1.14.47
@homepageURL    https://github.com/stonecrusher/stylus-UserCSS/tree/master/amazon
@supportURL     https://github.com/stonecrusher/stylus-UserCSS/issues
@license        CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0
@preprocessor   stylus

@var checkbox  darkstyle        'Darkstyle (DS)'      1
@var color     var_bg1          'DS Background'       #333
@var color     var_selected     'DS Background 2'     #6e583a
@var color     var_headfoot     'DS Header & footer background' #232f3e
@var color     var_font1        'DS Font color'       #ccc
@var color     var_linkdefault  'DS Link color'       #75a9d7
@var color     var_linkhover    'DS Link hover color' #cc5800
@var color     var_price        'DS Price color'      #ff3b14
@var range     darkProductImage 'DS Darken product images'   [0.8,0.4,1,0.05]
@var checkbox  compact          'Compact mode & Less ads'    1
@var checkbox  hide-similar     'Hide other customer item recommendations' 1
@var checkbox  hide-ask         'Hide customer q&a'          0
@var checkbox  hide-cart        'Hide shopping card sidebar' 0
@var checkbox  mark-sponsored   'Mark sponsored results'     1
@var checkbox  av-pause-remove  'Remove Video pause overlay' 1
@var text      review-width     'Width of review bars'       300px
==/UserStyle== */
/* Amazon default review bar width is 185px */


@-moz-document regexp("https?:\\/\\/(www|music)\\.amazon\\.(cn|in|sg|ae|fr|de|pl|it|nl|es|ca|se|com(\\.(mx|au|br|tr|be))?|co\\.(uk|jp))\\/.*") {
    
    /* Stylus variables */
    /* Colors to be replaced are in the comment */
    
 /* var_bg1         = selectable DS Background     // #fff */
    var_bg2         = lighten(var_bg1, 10%)        // #f6f6f6
    var_bg2a7       = alpha(lighten(var_bg1, 10%),.7)
    var_bg2a8       = alpha(lighten(var_bg1, 10%),.8)
    var_bg3         = lighten(var_bg1, 20%)        // #fafafa
    var_bg4         = lighten(var_bg1, 25%)        // #F2F2F2, #eff7fe, #f3f3f3, #cdcdcd
    var_bg5         = lighten(var_bg1, 30%)        // #EAEDED, #eee, #e7e9ec
    var_bg6         = lighten(var_bg1, 40%)        // #ddd
    var_bg7         = lighten(var_bg1, 50%)        // #d3d3d3
 
 /* var_selected    = selectable DS Background 2   // #fef8f2, brownish golden */
 /* var_headfoot    = selectable DS Header & footer bg  // #232f3e, darkblue */

    var_font7       = invert(var_bg1)              // #ffffff, white
    var_font0       = lighten(var_font1,20%)       // #111111, black
 /* var_font1       = selectable DS Font color     // #333333 */
    var_font2       = darken(var_font1, 12%)       // #444444
    var_font3       = darken(var_font1, 20%)       // #555555, #666666, #888888

 /* var_linkdefault = selectable DS Link color     // #0066C0, blue */
    var_font8       = darken(var_linkdefault, 50%) // #0066c0
 /* var_linkhover   = selectable DS Hover color    // #c45500, #e47911, orange */
 /* var_price       = selectable DS Price color    // #B12704, red */
 /******************************************************************************/   
    /*** Start of code ***/

    if darkstyle {
        body,
        #dp table[bgcolor="#ffffff"],
        #nav-search .nav-search-field,
        .a-box .a-divider.a-divider-break h5, .a-color-base-background .a-divider.a-divider-break h5, .a-divider.a-divider-break h5,

        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button.disabled + .overlay .icon, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button.stopped + .overlay .icon,
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-next-button::before {
            border-color: transparent transparent transparent var_font1 !important;
        }
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-previous-button::after {
            border-color: transparent var_font1 transparent transparent !important;
        }
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-all-container:hover .sample-button.playing, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-all-container:hover .sample-button.stopped, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-container:hover .sample-button.playing, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-container:hover .sample-button.stopped,
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-next-button.playing:hover, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-previous-button.playing:hover {
            border-color: var_font1 !important;
        }
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button.loading + .overlay .icon, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button.playing + .overlay .icon, #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button.playing.sample-all + .overlay .icon,
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-previous-button::before,
        #dmusicTracklist_feature_div .sample-button#sample-next-button::after {
            background-color: var_font1 !important;
        }

        /* Games and software library */
        .dsv-cBoxTL, .dsv-cBoxTR, .dsv-cBoxBL, .dsv-cBoxBR,
        .dsv-whiteBoxTL, .dsv-whiteBoxTR, .dsv-whiteBoxBL, .dsv-whiteBoxBR {
            background-image: none !important;
        }

        /*** Gradients ***/
        hr.bucketDivider::after,
        #gw-content-grid-bottom > div, #gw-content-grid-top > div,
        .kfs-bg-container,
        .atsDDCC, .atsDDCL, .atsDDCR,
        .atsDDFBC, .atsDDFBL, .atsDDFBR, .atsDDFCC, .atsDDFCL, .atsDDFCR, .atsDDHBC, .atsDDHBL, .atsDDHBR, .atsDDHCC, .atsDDHCL, .atsDDHCR, .atsDDHTC, .atsDDHTL, .atsDDHTR, .atsDDLC, .atsDDLL, .atsDDLR, .atsDDUC, .atsDDUL, .atsDDUR {
            background-image: none !important;
        }
        #rhf .rhf-divider,
        .a-box .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner, .a-color-base-background .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner, .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff8, #fff1 3px, transparent) !important;
        }
        #rhf .rhf-divider::after,
        .a-box .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner::after, .a-color-base-background .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner::after, .a-divider.a-divider-section .a-divider-inner::after {
            background: linear-gradient(to right, var_bg1, rgba(255,255,255,0), var_bg1) !important;
        }
        .fadeGradient,
        .a-expander-content-fade {
            background: linear-gradient(to top, var_bg1 15%, rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%) !important;
        }
        .MusicCartReviewListEditColumn {
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,0), var_bg3 10%) !important;
        }
        .aivDetailsGradient {
            background: radial-gradient(ellipse at center, var_bg2a7 0, var_bg2a8 48%, var_bg2 70%, var_bg2 100%) !important;
        }
        .a-form-actions,
        .a-popover-header,
        .banner-border,
        table.a-bordered tr:first-child th,
        table.myx-bordered tr:first-child th {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var_bg2, var_bg1) !important;
            border-color: var_bg6 !important;
        }
        hr.bucketDivider,
        .a-divider-normal.bucketDivider {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var_bg5, lighten(var_bg1,3%) 3px, var_bg1) !important;
            &::after {
                background: linear-gradient(to left, var_bg1, transparent , var_bg1) !important;
            }
        }

        /* Amazon Music buttons */
        .navButton {
            background-color: var_bg3 !important;
            &:hover {
                background-color: var_bg4 !important;
            }
        }
        .navButton .buttonContainer .title {
            color: var_font1 !important;
        }
        /* Amazon Music Search Box */
        .dragonfly .searchBox {
            background-color: rgba(242,243,243,0.4) !important;
            color: black !important;
        }
        .suggestions-list li:hover td {
            background-color: var_bg4 !important;
            color: var_font7 !important;
        }
        @css {
            .albumArtWrapper {
                background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;
            }
        }
        /* Review bars */
        .a-meter {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, var_bg3, var_bg5) !important;
        }
        /* "Send to this address" */
        .a-box-title .a-box-inner {
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, darken(var_bg2, 20%), var_bg2) !important;
        }
        
        /* Darken product images */
        .product-image,
        .hud-profile-categories-image,
        .comparison_image_title_cell img,
        .octopus-sims-img,
        .hud-orders-image,
        .hud-dashboard-card-v2-image,
        .recs-carousel-element-img-outer,
        .a-image-container,
        .landscape-image,
        [class^="_quad-category-card_style_fluidLandscapeImage"],
        [data-cy="ad-topper-card-image"] > img {
            opacity: darkProductImage !important;
        }
        /* Darken product images less that have dark background */
        .dealContainer img,
        .a-dynamic-image,
        .bxc-grid__image,
        .img-wrap,
        .acs-ln-header > img,
        .card-images img,
        .octopus-pc-category-card-v2-image,
        .octopus-pc-item-image,
        .generic-subnav-flyout-image,
        .imageThumbnail,
        .sims-fbt-image,
        .coupon-image,
        .s-access-image,
        .octopus-quick-look-product-image,
        .rhf-RVIs > a > img[width="50px"],
        .asin-image,
        .aok-inline-block[style^="cursor:pointer; width:110px;"],
        .g-itemImage,
        [id^="iyrListItemImg"],
        .a-carousel-card.rvi-item > span > a > img,
        .s-image,
        .ewc-item-cover-left > img,
        .ewc-item-info-left > a > img {
            opacity: darkProductImage + ( (1 - darkProductImage) / 4) !important;
        }

        /* User profiles */
        .nudge-container.desktop,
        .view-alert-container.desktop .view-alert.self {
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var_bg1, 0 0 0 3px #89CD89 !important;
        }
        .avatar-image-container.desktop .circular-avatar-image {
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px var_bg2 !important;
        }
        
        /* Parcel tracking page */
        #errorPageContainer .grayExceptionBtn-group a, #mapTracking-bottomSheet-container .grayExceptionBtn-group a, #pageContainer .grayExceptionBtn-group a {
            border-bottom: 2px solid var_bg6 !important;
            background-color: var_bg2 !important;
        }
        
        /* Fast checkout popup */
        #checkout-page-container .turbo-checkout-panel-link:hover {
            background: var_bg2 linear-gradient(to right,var_bg1,var_bg2,var_bg1) !important;
        }
        #checkout-page-container .turbo-checkout-push-to-bottom {
            background: var_bg1 linear-gradient(to bottom,var_bg3,var_bg1) !important;
        }
        /* Strange PrimeMusic Reviewbar issue */
        #dmusic_tracklist_content table.a-keyvalue td, table.a-keyvalue th {
            padding: 7px 14px 6px;
        }
        /* Parcel tracking */
        .milestone.notReached .milestone-marker::before {
            background: var_bg3 !important;
            border-color: var_bg6 !important;
        }
        #promise-container #secondaryStatus {
            color: var_font1 !important;
        }
    }
    .p13n-best-seller [class*="best-seller-glimmer"] {
        display: none !important;
    }
    
    /*** Conditionals ***/
    if compact {
        #poweredByEmpty,

        #amsSparkleAdWrapper,
        #nav-swmslot,
        #desktop-banner,
        #gw-desktop-herotator,
        #content > div.a-section.dv-collection:first-of-type,
        .billboardRowWrapper,
        #ADPlaceholder,
        #sponsoredProducts_feature_div,
        #sponsoredProducts_feature_div + table,
        #sponsoredProducts_feature_div + table + hr,
        #ape_Detail_dp-ads-center-promo_Desktop_placement,
        #ape_Detail_ad-endcap-1_Glance_placement,
        #sc-new-upsell,
        .bxw-pageheader__sponsor,
        
        /* #centerPlus, /* erwischt auch "keine Ergebnisse gefunden" */
        #detail-ilm_div,
        #percolate-ui-ilm_div,
        .super-tcg, /* Amazon Video: Fire-TV top ad */
        .dv-product-offer,
        #nav-upnav,
        div[name="goKindleStaticPopDiv"],
        /* not #productDetails + hr.bucketDivider
        https://www.amazon.de/dp/B001SP9N86/
        hr.bucketDivider:not(.a-divider-normal),
        */
        #promotions_feature_div,
        #quickPromoBucketContent,
        #quickPromoBucketContent ~ #sims-fbt > hr.bucketDivider:nth-child(1), /* Sell */
        #gbox-ad-row-2\.0,
        #csg-search-cu,
        #top table table img,
        .askQuestionExamples,
        .prime-ad-banner-content,
        #productAlert_feature_div,
        #universalHQP_feature_div,
        #huc-v2-cobrand-stripe, /* Before payment VISA banner */
        #primeCentralHomepagePromotionSlotContentImportedFromMS3,
        #issuancePriceblockAmabot_feature_div, /* Prime VISA inline */
        /* Share */
        #tellAFriendBylineBox_feature_div,
        #tellAFriendBox_feature_div,
        /* Dash buttons */
        #digital-dash-create,
        #digitalDashLowProminence_feature_div,
        #digitalDashHighProminenceAccordion_feature_div,
        #rightCol > #moreBuyingChoices_feature_div > div.a-section.a-spacing-medium.a-spacing-top-base > #mbc-action-panel-wrapper + div.a-section.a-padding-base, /* Sell stuff */
        #prime-pda-type-box-ad,
        #dp-ads-center-promo_feature_div,
        #dp-ads-middle_feature_div,
        #hqpWrapper,
        #dp-ads-center-promo-top_feature_div,
        #quickPromoDivId,
        #promotions-list_feature_div,
        .rush-component[data-component-type="s-brand-footer-slot"],
        .rush-component[data-component-type="s-footer-slot"],
        #cm_cr-rvw_summary-ads,
        #customer-survey_feature_div,
        #marketing,
        #nav-link-prime, /* discover prime benefits */
        #maple-dss-slot, /* sign up for amazon visa card */
        #detail-ilm_feature_div, /* 15€ action voucher */
        #WLHUC_footer, /* Amazon Assistant ad */
        .dv-dp-node-watchparty > div > .dvui-callout-container /* Watch party flyout */,
        .customer-feedback-widget.form-common-main,
        #maple-smart-wagon-full-page, /* Checkout: Credit card bonus banner */
        .nav-prime-tt.nav-flyout, /* Prime ad on front page */
        #attach-accessories, /* discover additional products sidebar */
        #widget-rightUpsellSlot /* Upselling after purchase */{
            display: none !important;
        }

        /* Prime Video App 2020-02-04 */
        article._3EPDij {
            display: none !important;
        }
        /* Amazon Music */
        .primeBrowseHeader + .carousel,
        .barker,
        #appUpsellBanner,
        #bannerWrapper {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        /* Sponsored results */
        .s-item-container > h5.a-spacing-none ~ *,
        #atfResults h5[class*="sponsored"] ~ *,
        #pdagEncapsulated,
        .AdHolder {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        /* Prime Video ToC note */
        .tancaccept,
        /* Prime Video watch on TV */
        .dv-dp-top-banner,
        /* Prime Video Teaser Carousel */
        .a-section.a-spacing-small.dv-hero-carousel,
        .a-section.a-spacing-none.dv-hero-carousel.dv-superhero-carousel,
        .DigitalVideoWebNodeStorefront_Collection__AboveNav.DigitalVideoWebNodeStorefront_Collection__containsSuperHero,
        /* Prime Video watch offline ad */
        .av-detail-section > article.av-hql-container {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        /* Sidebar */
        #sidebar-top,
        #sidebar-bottom {
            display: none !important;
        }
        .a-fixed-right-grid-inner[style="padding-right:310px"] {
            padding-right: 0 !important;
        }
        [id^="image-map_image-map-ns_"].a-section.shogun-widget.image-map.aui-desktop-map /*social media BS*/ {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        /* Footer */
        #navFooter {
            display: none !important;
        }
        /* "Items other people bought after looking at this" (maybe affecting Prime Video Movie-Metadata?)*/
        #view_to_purchase-sims-feature > .a-section > .a-section > .a-unordered-list {
            display: flex !important;
        }
        /* Amazon Assistant (after ordering) */
        .bit-aa-install-widget-contents,
        #cs-app-prompt {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        /* prevent dividers from collapsing when hiding above section */
        #dp-container > hr {
            width: 100% !important;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: "Amazon Ember",Arial,sans-serif !important;
        }
        
        /* hide sub nav banner */
        #masrw-top > #skippedLink ~ div[cel_widget_id^="desktop-dp-atf_"] {
            display: none !important;
        }
    }
    if hide-ask {
        #ask-btf_feature_div,
        #ask-dp-search_feature_div,
        .askReviewsPageAskWidget,
        #cf-ask-cel,
        .celwidget[cel_widget_id^="ask-swdp-"],
        #ask_feature_div {
            display: none !important;
        }
    }
    if hide-cart {
        #nav-flyout-ewc {
            display: none !important;
        }
        .nav-ewc-persistent-hover.a-js body {
            padding-right: 1px !important;
        }
    }
    if mark-sponsored {
        /* Mark sponsored search results */
        .s-item-container > h5.a-spacing-none,
        #atfResults h5[class*="sponsored"] {
            color: black !important;
            letter-spacing: 5px !important;
            background-color: var_price !important;
            font-weight: bold !important;
        }
        #pdagEncapsulated,
        .AdHolder {
            border: 1px dashed var_price !important;
        }
        .sponsoredBy,
        .adFeedback__text,
        .s-result-item.AdHolder div.sg-col-inner > div.a-section.a-spacing-none > span.a-size-base.a-color-secondary {
            color: var_price !important;
        }
    }
    if av-pause-remove {
        /* Amazon Video Pause-overlay transparent */
        .f1bkfbcl, .fnu5k6u, .fofauj8 {
            opacity: 0 !important;
        }
        /* Title readability */
        .fgzdi7m,
        .f15586js {
            text-shadow:  1px  1px 1px black,
                          1px -1px 1px black,
                         -1px  1px 1px black,
                         -1px -1px 1px black !important;
        }
        /* Seekbar color */
        .f15vbt64 {
            background-color: var_price !important;
        }
        /* Header margin */
        /* X-Ray */
        .xrayQuickView .collapsibleXrayHeader,
        /* Title */
        .ff48h02,
        /* Controls */
        .f1uwz81n {
            margin-top: 1vw !important;
        }
        /* Footer margin */
        .fc1n9o1 {
            padding-bottom: 1vw !important;
        }
    }
    if hide-similar {
        div[id^="sims-consolidated-"],
        /*#sims-consolidated-1_feature_div,
        #sims-consolidated-2_feature_div,
        #sims-consolidated-3_feature_div,
        #sims-consolidated-4_feature_div,
        */
        div[id*="-similarities-sims-feature-"],
        /*
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_session-similarities-sims-feature-1,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_session-similarities-sims-feature-2,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_session-similarities-sims-feature-3,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_session-similarities-sims-feature-4,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_purchase-similarities-sims-feature-1,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_purchase-similarities-sims-feature-1,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_purchase-similarities-sims-feature-1,
        #p13n-m-desktop-dp-sims_purchase-similarities-sims-feature-1,
        */
        #recommendations_feature_div,
        #huc-last-upsell-rows > .a-row:last-child,
        div[cel_widget_id^="desktop-dp-sims_hardlines-day0-sims-feature-"],
        #attach-accessories {
            display: none !important;
        }
    }
    
    /*** Review-width ***/
    /*** At the bottom of a product page ***/
    #reviewSummary > .a-fixed-left-grid > .a-fixed-left-grid-inner {
        padding-left: review-width !important;
    }
    #reviewSummary > .a-fixed-left-grid > .a-fixed-left-grid-inner > .a-col-left {
        width: review-width !important;
        margin-left: -(review-width) !important;
    }
    
    /*** Next to reviews ***/
    #reviewsMedley > div[style="padding-left:300px"] {
        padding-left: review-width !important;
    }
    #reviewsMedley > div[style="padding-left:300px"] > div[style="width:300px;margin-left:-300px;float:left;"] {
        width: review-width !important;
        margin-left: - review-width !important;
    }
    #reviewsMedley > div[style="padding-left:300px"] > div[style="width:300px;margin-left:-300px;float:left;"] .a-fixed-left-grid-col[style="width:400px;margin-left:-280px;float:left;"] {
        width: review-width !important;
    }

    /*** Separate review page ***/
    /* container is 15px wider here by default */
    #cm_cr-product_info > .a-fixed-left-grid-inner {
        padding-left: (review-width - 15px) !important;
    }
    #cm_cr-product_info > .a-fixed-left-grid-inner > .a-col-left {
        width: (review-width - 15px) !important;
        margin-left: -(review-width - 15px) !important;
    }
    /* "Write new review" button */
    #cm_cr-product_info + .ratings-solicitation > .a-fixed-left-grid-inner {
        padding-left: (review-width - 15px) !important;
    }
    /*** Review-width end ***/
}
